column5: The Psychology MSc, accredited by the British Psychological Society (BPS), has been designed to provide students without an undergraduate psychology degree with the necessary skills and understanding to take up rewarding careers in the field, by providing a comprehensive understanding of biological, developmental, cognitive and social psychology.
column7: Fees for the academic year 2022/23  MSc: £15,300 PGDip: £10,200 PGCert: £5,100  Fees for the academic year 2023/24  MSc: £16,065 PGDip: £10,710 PGCert: £5,355
